title: 500 error in validator client rest response
body:
beacon node: ```2021-08-20 21:12:41.660+00:00 | pool-18-thread-333 | WARN | Web3jEth1Provider | Endpoint mainnet.infura.io [1] is INVALID | Invalid response received: 504; 504 Gateway Time-out

504 Gateway Time-out

``` validator client: ``` 2021-08-20 07:38:15.011+00:00 | validator-async-0 | ERROR | teku-validator-log | Validator *** Failed to produce attestation Slot: 1885089 Validator: 841f23c java.lang.RuntimeException: Unexpected response from Beacon Node API (url = http://teku-mainnet-beaconchain-client-service:5051/eth/v1/validator/attestation_data?slot=1885089&committee_in dex=45, status = 500, response = {"status":500,"message":"An unexpected error occurred"}) at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.remote.apiclient.ResponseHandler.unknownResponseCodeHandler(ResponseHandler.java:70) ~[teku-validator-remote-21.8.1.jar:21.8.1] at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.remote.apiclient.ResponseHandler.handleResponse(ResponseHandler.java:64) ~[teku-validator-remote-21.8.1.jar:21.8.1] at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.remote.apiclient.OkHttpValidatorRestApiClient.executeCall(OkHttpValidatorRestApiClient.java:388) ~[teku-validator-remote-21.8.1.jar:21.8.1] ``` ``` 2021-08-20 07:38:15.008+00:00 | beaconchain-async-3 | ERROR | BeaconRestApi | Failed to process request to URL http://teku-mainnet-beaconchain-client-service:5051/eth/v1/validator/attesta tion_data java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Cannot create attestation for future slot. Requested 1885089 but current slot is 1885088 at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.coordinator.ValidatorApiHandler.createAttestationData(ValidatorApiHandler.java:317) ~[teku-validator-coordinator-21.8.1.jar:21.8.1] at jdk.internal.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor67.invoke(Unknown Source) ~[?:?] at jdk.internal.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source) ~[?:?] at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source) ~[?:?] at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.events.DirectEventDeliverer.executeMethod(DirectEventDeliverer.java:74) ~[teku-infrastructure-events-21.8.1.jar:21.8.1] at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.events.DirectEventDeliverer.deliverToWithResponse(DirectEventDeliverer.java:67) ~[teku-infrastructure-events-21.8.1.jar:21.8.1] at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.events.AsyncEventDeliverer.lambda$deliverToWithResponse$1(AsyncEventDeliverer.java:75) ~[teku-infrastructure-events-21.8.1.jar:21.8.1] at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.events.AsyncEventDeliverer$QueueReader.deliverNextEvent(AsyncEventDeliverer.java:117) ~[teku-infrastructure-events-21.8.1.jar:21.8.1] at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.events.AsyncEventDeliverer$QueueReader.run(AsyncEventDeliverer.java:109) ~[teku-infrastructure-events-21.8.1.jar:21.8.1] at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) [?:?] at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) [?:?] at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:?] ``` ``` 2021-08-20 07:38:01.732+00:00 | beaconchain-async-0 | INFO | StateGenerator | Completed regeneration of block 0x724cf0725adc0766bb40d7130a6bba940ac363e51f91f6554882ffebdd91a589 at slot 1 885086 by replaying 29 blocks. Took 515ms ``` will try to get some logs... to make it more clear...
